    • redirect_uri

      OAuthApi.Params redirect_uri(URI redirect_uri)

    • username

      OAuthApi.Params username(String username)
      Parameters:
      username - Hint that you want the user to log in with a specific Lichess username.

    • state

      OAuthApi.Params state(String state)
      Parameters:
      state - Arbitrary state that will be returned verbatim with the authorization result.

    • code_challenge_method

      OAuthApi.Params code_challenge_method(String code_challenge_method)
      Parameters:
      code_challenge_method - Must be S256. Default S256.

    • response_type

      OAuthApi.Params response_type(String response_type)
      Parameters:
      response_type - Must be code. Default code.
